name: Millenial Falcon
description:
Milennial Falcon is a short platformer made at Kaktus Jam 2018 in Copenhagen, Denmark.

A young bird is tasked with delivering letters up the Old Tree, and along the way the letters reveal to the player the emotional burden (birden?) the titular Millennial Falcon is dealing with.

What will our protagonist find at the top?

Controls:
Keyboard:
WASD - Walking
Space - Jumping

Controller:
Left analog stick - Walking
Square button (PS4) or A button (XBOX)  - Jumping

Credits:
Christopher A. Orloff Bech - Designer, Programmer
Roxanne Angeline van Dam - Programmer
Daniel Gaard Hansen - Programmer
Julia van Straaten - Artist
Benjamin Weinberg - Programmer
